Title: Cinderella Story
Plot: When Joey turns to Pacey for rescuing after she flees Boston halfway through her visit with A.J., the two old friends may finally confront their growing feelings for each other. Meanwhile, to avoid suspension, Pacey becomes a mentor to a young boy and must contend with a little version of himself with a big attitude; and behind Gail's back, Dawson asks Mitch to help with the opening of her new restaurant.
GuestStars: Robin Dunne, Jonathan Lipnicki, Deborah Kellner, Hank Troscianiec, Andrea Powell, Corey Jackson, Nick Prange, Karen Kirschenbauer
